means: 齐诺( Zeno of Citium (5zinEu Ev 5siFiEm)西希昂的齐诺
斯多葛派的创始人； Zeno of Elea 埃利亚的齐诺

sentence.Network_en: Zeno and his followers placed the concept of " nature " in the center of their philosophical system.
sentence.Network_cn: 芝诺及其追随者把 “ 自然 ” 的概念作为他们哲学体系的核心.

sentence.Network_en: Zeno of Elea: To prove it could never reach the other side.
sentence.Network_cn: 季诺: 为了证明它永远到不了另一边.

sentence.Network_en: Zeno If you can cut shit in half forever, is shit infinite?
sentence.Network_cn: 奇诺:如果你能不断将大便切成两等分, 大便是不是无限的 呢 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...14岁身高,166cm生日,12月7日,首次出场曲,月下,发布日期,调教,zeno, 洛亦天(7张)星座,射手座外貌,灰发,金瞳,项部配碧.
zeni 急用zeno 急驶zenq 厩肥
zeno 善男, zeno 塞诺, zeno 善雄

encyclopedia.content: 芝诺(埃利亚) (Zeno of Elea)约公元前490年生于意大利半岛南部的埃利亚；约公元前425年卒．数学、哲学．

means.word_mean: 1. ancient Greek philosopher who formulated paradoxes that defended the belief that motion and change are illusory (circa 495-430 BC)
2. ancient Greek philosopher who found the Stoic school (circa 335-263 BC)

auth_sentence.content: Zeno problem of motion and time is resolved.
auth_sentence.res_content: Zeno problem of motion and time is resolved.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Zeno problem of motion and time is resolved.

auth_sentence.content: The theses of Parmenides are expressly said to follow the method of Zeno.
auth_sentence.res_content: The theses of Parmenides are expressly said to follow the method of Zeno.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The theses of Parmenides are expressly said to follow the method of Zeno.

auth_sentence.content: Vivaldi had Carlo Goldoni adapt an existing libretto by Apostolo Zeno.
